General.Name: China Reform Health Management and Services Group Co Ltd
General.Description: China Reform Health Management and Services Group Co., Ltd. offers medical insurance management services in China. The company is involved in business that covers 177 medical insurance in 25 provinces. It is also involved in the pharmaceutical and medical business. The company was formerly known as SeaRainbow Holding Corp. and changed its name to China Reform Health Management and Services Group Co., Ltd. in May 2018. China Reform Health Management and Services Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is based in Beijing, China.

5.Name: Mr. Yonghua  Li
5.Title: Non-Independent Director and Deputy Gen. Mang.
